remarks: If ` A ` is a member of the filter, then truncating ` F ` to ` A ` and regenerating the behavior outside ` A ` using ` filGen ` recovers the original filter.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement: fgtr $p |- ( ( F e. ( Fil ` X ) /\ A e. F ) -> ( X filGen ( F |`t A ) ) = F ) $.
